extendedInfo.description: Stock Messaging App with Google Voice capabilities.Big Thanks to the All About Android Podcast for featuring us!http://twit.tv/show/all-about-android/101## WHY YOU WILL LOVE THIS APPâ¢ Single app to manage your text messages (Google Voice and Carrier)â¢ Sends Google Voice messages over DATA/WiFiâ¢ Google Voice & Carrier message POPUP Notifications with QUICK REPLYâ¢ Great Google Voice alternative that actually worksâ¢ Uses your stock messaging database for easy backup (See SMS Backup app)## WHAT IS THIS?We have rebuilt the stock messaging application and added Google Voice capabilities into it. It supports sending and receiving Google Voice texts within the messaging application. It uses DATA/WIFI to receive and send Google Voice texts, therefore, you don't get charged by your carrier. (Note: You will still be charged if you send a text via your carrier. The only time you won't be charged is WHEN YOU SEND/RECEIVE A TEXT VIA GOOGLE VOICE. As long as you see the message "SENDING VIA GOOGLE VOICE" on your phone, you won't be charged, as the app uses your DATA/WIFI plan. This app will also show the REAL SENDER NUMBER instead of a random number when you receive a text on your Google Voice account.## BENEFITS TO YOUDo you use Google Voice as well as your phone carrier? Do you have a Google Voice number, and a carrier number? Do you constantly have to switch to Google Voice app for GV texts, and the Stock Messaging App for the carrier text? Download our Messaging + Google Voice App to have a unified interface for both GV and carrier messages.Are you using a tablet/phone without a phone/text plan? This application will allow you to text from your tablet, using the stock messaging interface, with your Google Voice account!The Google Voice app still needs to be installed on your phone, The benefit to you is, now you can send and receive your text messages in a single app, whether Google Voice or Carrier messages.## INSTRUCTIONS:Make sure the Google Voice App is installed on your device.Make sure to turn OFF Google Voice message forwarding. This app will grab the GV incoming texts. If you are receiving Google Voice text from a random number, then you are still being charged by your carrier.Upon installing the M+GV app, go to Settings, and find the Google Voice section. Enable Google Voice. If you are getting double notifications, please read the help section. or visit:http://stockmessagingwithgooglevoice.blogspot.com/2013/01/android-stock-messaging-application.htmlFor any questions, bug reports, please write us at dreambigandroidhelp@gmail.com## IMPORTANT NOTEThis is the TRIAL of our app (200 messages) that will ask you to upgrade to the PRO version after it expires!** The cost of the PRO version is $4.99 and can be purchased within the app **Please consider upgrading to the PRO version and support us! Your support will help us improve the application, and make it the best one on the market. Thank you!If you upgrade to PRO version and decide to uninstall the app, next time you install, it will automatically become PRO. Given that you are using the same Gmail address, you only need to purchase this app once for all of your devices. For more information, please check out our help pages!## UPCOMING FEATURESThemes, SMS Sync, Facebook Messenger Integration, Twitter DMOur goal is to make this the single app that *optionally* integrates your messages:Google Voice, Facebook, Twitter, and of course, your Carrier Messages.## CAN'T WAIT FOR DARK THEME?Feel free to request a beta version from DreamBigAndroidHelp@gmail.comWe will email you instructions.## SIMILAR APPSHandcent, SMS Popup, GoSMS, ChompSMS, NotifierPro## KEYWORDSGV SMS, Google Voice SMS, SMS Notifications, Stock MMS with Google Voice, Google Voice Messaging

reviews.title: Help information
reviews.comment: That blog you have set up isn\'t going to the links I press. I want to use the actual app followed your instructions in the description, but it isn\'t working. Tried different settings it still goes through the GV app. Also, the text shows sending, then not sent, but receiver does get it and responds, but I don\'t receive the response.
reviews.author: P Johanna

reviews.title: Needs call interceptor
reviews.comment: A similar app called voice+ has a call out interceptor feature that this app needs. if the author can integrate this capability I would be willing to pay 5 bucks.
reviews.author: Lyndon Zzz

reviews.title: Nice. But!
reviews.comment: I saved the GV number it uses for the contact, some random number. Anyway, I thought the smart text would still send it through GV, but it doesn\'t..
reviews.author: C.E. Meza

reviews.title: Thanks for the update
reviews.comment: SMS work again with the newest google voice app. thanks you
reviews.author: Terry Kan

reviews.title: Works again.
reviews.comment: Used to be great,  then broke, now great again!
reviews.author: Joseph Muench

reviews.title: Works good.but.....
reviews.comment: The app works well, untill the trial expires..... Then asks me to pay.why would anybody want to pay for a stock app? Uninstalled.
reviews.author: anthony spink

reviews.title: Outstanding app
reviews.comment: One place to manage messaging. My main messaging app.  Fix for latest version of Google Voice works great.
reviews.author: Greg Lewis

reviews.title: Love seeing correct numbers with my sms messages and smart send yeah!
reviews.comment: having 2 issues On tablet just completely stopped working..  On phone it works but randomly misses some gv messages completely or delivers then 3 to 12 hours late (confirmed that GV receives then immediately and email copy is immediate)... Been a real problem w/ it happening with critical text from critical people.. Love the app but if I can\'t rely on it 99.9% of the time then I can\'t really use it... Already GF won\'t use Google voice number anymore.. Which is a pain and not the direction I was hoping for
reviews.author: ,Shiloh Enriquez

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: This app is good, I use it for my SMS application exclusively. But the popup notification system is dated for jellybean and up phones with expandable notifications. If you added expandable notifications that then allow you to bring up the updated popup it would be a whole lot better, otherwise I enjoy this app.
reviews.author: David Babcock

reviews.title: A must have with Google Voice
reviews.comment: Definitely enhances the GV experience. Would be good if it would mark the message as read after opening the message on Google Voice web interface.  Looking forward to even more updates.
reviews.author: Ryan Kirk

reviews.title: I want to use the dark theme
reviews.comment: So far so good. I\'ve been looking for an app to integrate the two and this seems to be the only one.  High hopes for this app. I would love to have a dark theme though.
reviews.author: Dante Walters

reviews.title: Enable Voicemail Display
reviews.comment: If you check the box that says, \"View and play voicemails from the phone call log\", you\'ll see a voicemail whenever you check the call log when you get a missed call.  You can even play it from there.
reviews.author: Dav Noel

reviews.title: Working better
reviews.comment: Seems to be working much better with the latest update, using the latest version of G-Voice.
reviews.author: Scott Matics

reviews.title: Works Slightly Better but still not great.
reviews.comment: The workaround for using the most recent Google Voice is working, but now I\'m going to miss out whenever I have a voicemail since GV is what notifies of that. Also, the app still runs VERY slow. Still disappointed with the $5 purchase. Trial worked great, but now an inconvenience at every turn. I really hope this sluggishness gets remedied real soon.
reviews.author: Jake Bantz

reviews.title: Edited -- Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Uninstalled this app. The \"solution\" of downgrading GV results in the downgraded GV updating itself (if you have it set to automatically update) and having this app prompt you to delete the updated GV and reinstall the old GV. To suggest this is a \"solution\" is ridiculous.  I\'d like my $5 back too.
reviews.author: Julie O\'Connor

reviews.title: Not working unfortunately
reviews.comment: I was hoping this would work by improving the notifications I get when an SMS message comes in via Google Voice. Unfortunately the opposite has happened.  I get no notification at all now when I receive an SMS.  Not what I wanted...
reviews.author: Raleigh Moody

reviews.title: Works without a hiccup
reviews.comment: The app works really great. Just a few minor things on my wishlist:  1. I\'d prefer support for drawer quick action rather than an intrusive pop up quick reply. Other than that, this is really a useful app. 2. When sending SMS from the phone rejection screen or the People app, it seems to bypass the GV integration. Hope this can be updated in the future.
reviews.author: Charlie Shay

reviews.title: Does not work with latest Google Voice
reviews.comment: When GV updated it\'s app a few months ago, I didn\'t download the update, because I figured it would break this app.  Low and behold, it did.  After a few months, the developer of this app released a fix (a long wait if you ask me).  I finally updated to the latest iteration of GV, and it broke this app again.  I uninstalled both, reconfigured settings for each, and it still wouldn\'t work.  The devs solution is to completely disable GV notification in Settings.  This is not a real fix, because if you use GV for voicemail, you\'ll never get a notification for your voicemails.  Not acceptable.  4-5 star app if it works.  1 star for now.  And, developer is slow to respond or patch app.
reviews.author: Mark Cadle

reviews.title: NOT THAT GOOD
reviews.comment: Was using the Google voice app for months. And occasionally the messages would get stuck being queued for no apparent reason or stop sending until I deleted that thread and started a new one. This app seems Mich less buggy and useful.  Edit: doesn\'t sync or.notify if I turn off gv app notifications
reviews.author: Jacky Ho

reviews.title: Got it working....
reviews.comment: Alright, I found the instructions you posted.  The only problem I foresee with this newest workaround is that now I won\'t get voicemail notifications from the Google Voice app.
reviews.author: Wendell Seace
